cause.description:
The Christopher Steele Foundation raises money for individuals who are researching cures for brain tumors (with particular emphasis on sarcomas). The Foundation is especially interested in innovative treatment approaches. Funds may also be directed to services that support patients and their families. In the future, the Foundation owuld like to grant scholarships to young men and women whose athletic, academic or other activities reflect Chris' interests and life.
1. Everyone has the right for hope.
cause.mission: Our mission is to keep Chris' memory alive by raising funds to support cancer research.
